title: Skarner
body: you broke him, now you need to fix him

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZHv1106E,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-08-22T00:39:44.117+0000)
>
> doesn't do anything

He does loads of things slow paralyze high attack speed
and every stat and effect was nerfed, whoopy big buff with everything nerfed, lets celebrate

> [{quoted}](name=Talon12,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=ZHv1106E,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2015-08-22T10:22:05.626+0000)
>
> and every stat and effect was nerfed, whoopy big buff with everything nerfed, lets celebrate

His Q and W are more than before. His E too if you include the stun damage. He is so good they're going to nerf him next week.
then that 1 in every 70 games is going to become 1 in 110
